flavorText:
"Don't you agree that mogg intellects are improved by zombification?"
—Lord Dralnu

foreignData.flavorText: „Ganz ehrlich — findest Du nicht auch, daß Goblins als Zombies gleich viel intellektueller wirken?" —Lord Dralnu
foreignData.name: Dralnus Kreuzzug
foreignData.text: Alle Goblins erhalten +1/+1, sind schwarz, und zusätzlich zu ihrem Kreaturentyp auch Zombies.

foreignData.flavorText: « Ne pensez-vous pas que les moggs zombifiés sont plus intelligents ? » — Le seigneur Dralnu.
foreignData.name: Croisade de Dralnu
foreignData.text: Tous les gobelins gagnent +1/+1, sont noirs, et sont des zombies en plus de leurs types de créatures.

name: Dralnu's Crusade
originalText: All Goblins get +1/+1, are black, and are Zombies in addition to their creature types.

rulings.text: The Goblins are both Goblins and Zombies and they are black (they lose their previous color(s)).
This only affects Goblins which are on the battlefield. Ones in your graveyard, library, etc. are not changed to be black or to be Zombies.

text:
Goblin creatures get +1/+1.
All Goblins are black and are Zombies in addition to their other creature types.
